articles.description: The Health Minister expressed his sympathy to the families
articles.content:
A further nine people have died pin Northern Ireland from Coronavirus, it has been confirmed this afternoon.

articles.content:

articles.title: Barcelona to sell Nou Camp naming rights for first time to raise money in fight against coronavirus - The Sun
articles.content:
BARCELONA will sell the image rights for the Nou Camp for one year to raise money to fight the coronavirus outbreak.
Never before have the Spanish giants sold the rights to their magnificent stadium since it opened in 1957.
